FAQ.label: FAQ
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Have more questions? Feel free to contact us.

what.question: What exactly is a Company Brain?
what.answer: A Company Brain is a customized AI solution that brings together your entire corporate knowledge â€“ from documents, emails, wikis, and other sources â€“ in an intelligent, searchable system. Employees can ask questions in natural language and receive precise answers immediately.

duration.question: How long does implementation take?
duration.answer: Depending on the complexity and scope of your knowledge sources, implementation typically takes two to four weeks. You often have a first working system after just 1-2 weeks â€“ we work iteratively and deliver value quickly.

gdpr.question: Is it GDPR compliant?
gdpr.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your data is exclusively processed and stored on German servers. We work with GDPR-compliant cloud providers and implement all required technical and organizational data protection measures.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: Each project is individual, depending on scope, complexity, and number of users. In a free 15-minute initial consultation, we can understand your situation and give you a first estimate.

technical.question: Does my team need to be technically savvy?
technical.answer: No. The Company Brain is designed so that any employee can use it â€“ without technical knowledge. The operation is as simple as a Google search: ask a question, get an answer.

sources.question: Which documents and data sources can be integrated?
sources.answer: Practically all: PDFs, Word documents, Excel files, emails, Confluence, SharePoint, Google Drive, Notion, internal wikis, databases, and many more. We adapt the integration to your existing infrastructure.

difference.question: What sets you apart from ChatGPT Enterprise or Microsoft Copilot?
difference.answer: These tools are generic and don't know your company. Our Company Brain is specifically trained on your documents, processes, and terminology. It delivers precise, source-based answers from your own knowledge â€“ not from the internet.

security.question: How secure is our data?
security.answer: Maximum security: end-to-end encryption, German server locations, regular security audits, access controls, and on-request on-premise deployment. Your data belongs to you and is never used to train external models.
